sentence.Network_en: TV franchises will be auctioned to the highest bidder.
sentence.Network_cn: 电视特许经营权将拍卖给出价最高的投标人.

sentence.Network_en: The sale will be made to the highest bidder subject to a reserve price being attained.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要达到了拍卖底价，标的物就会出售给出价最高的竞买人。

sentence.Network_en: The house went to the highest bidder , ie the person who offered the most money.
sentence.Network_cn: 房子卖给了出价最高的人.

entry.def: A bidder is someone who offers to pay a certain amount of money for something that is being sold. If you sell something to the highest bidder, you sell it to the person who offers the most money for it.

example.ex: The sale will be made to the highest bidder subject to a reserve price being attained.
example.tran: 只要达到了拍卖底价，标的物就会出售给出价最高的竞买人。

entry.def: A bidder for something is someone who is trying to obtain it or do it.

example.ex: ...bidders for two licences to develop cellular telephone systems in Greece.
example.tran: 努力争取得到两张在希腊开发移动电话系统许可证的运营商

means.word_mean: 2. someone who makes a bid at cards
